Ixworth Library

Manager: Cathy McDonald

Village Hall, High Street, Ixworth
IP31 2HH

  • Tel: 01359 231493
  • Email: help@suffolklibraries.co.uk
  • Friends group: Friends of Ixworth Library
  • Facebook

Opening hours

Day Hours
Monday Closed
Tuesday 1030 – 1230, 1400 – 1600
Wednesday 1730 – 1930
Thursday 1030 – 1230, 1400 – 1730
Friday 1030 – 1230, 1330 – 1730
Saturday 1030 – 1300
Sunday 1100 – 1600

Branch facilities

  • Accessibility information
  • Payments: cash, cheques and cards accepted
  • Parking: available
  • Customer toilet

IT and printing facilities

  • Free wifi
  • Book a computer
  • Borrow iPad
  • Photocopying: available
  • Colour printing: available
  • Scan to email
  • Fax
  • Printing, photocopying & scanning charges

Regular events and activities

Children's events

Baby Bounce

Tuesday, 0945-1030

Soothing songs and gentle nursery rhymes for babies, term-time only. No session 10 September.

Find out more about Wordplay

Craft activities: for primary school age children

Sunday, 1130-1230

Tot Rock

Tuesday, 1330-1415

Songs and action rhymes for toddlers, term-time only. No session 10 September.

Find out more about Wordplay

Older people's events

Top Time: events and activities for older people

Sunday, 1400-1530

Reading groups

Book Ends reading group

first Sunday of the month, 1400-1500

Arts, crafts & games

Art group

Monday, 1000-1300

£1 per session. Contact Peter Longfield on 01359 235039 or peter.longfield@btinternet.com

Film, music & entertainment

Ixworth Film Night: £5 donation on the night, film starts 7:30pm

fourth Thursday of the month, 1830

Refreshments, bar and raffle available. If you'd like to volunteer to help plan, publicise and/or run these events, contact Debra on 01359 760326 or debra.j.reay@gmail.com
